page.title: 19Domesday in Yaxham
page.content: In 1980 a most interesting collection of photographs and documents was assembled for an exhibition of Village life held at Yaxham House. This years survey has been enjoyed by the older children at Yaxham School and has produced a wealth of information from parets and friends. The Village news 'Bits and Pieces' has carried an interesting series about the history of the area. As a direct result of work started during the survey, the school has been encouraged to start the formation of an archive of present-day information and historical material which will be available for reference to children and members of the public.
